评论概述: Light enough to wear on hot days!
评论详情: These men’s drawstring cargo pants are made of a nice thin but strong material, which make them great for summer wear. I ordered size XL, and these fit my 5’10”, 38” waist perfectly. They seemed a bit long at first, but after washing, they seemed to shorten up and be less baggy in the lower leg area. The bagginess does help keep you lower body cool, by allowing the are to breathe, so I’m ok with a little bit of room in these pants. The pockets on these pants are nice and roomy, and have Velcro fasteners. The drawstring helps winch the pants along with the simple elastic waist band. I just really like these pants, because I was looking for some summer olive green army pants, and these are spot on, and were very affordable!

These are great for winter, early spring and fall days when the weather is a bit chilly.  The weight is rather good... some might say heavy even.  And yet, the fabric is very soft and comfortable, not stiff at all.  They seem rather durable as they've held up to several wash cycles without incident.  The fit is good, as expected and I like the leg cuff rather than something loose and flopping around.  Overall, I'm quite happy with these sweatpants.

I got these because we have a small beach cottage and I wanted something to wear that would protect my legs from the sharp edges of the grasses/sedges along the shore and that would dry quickly when I go kayaking. These perform very, very well on those fronts and they are extremely comfortable. My only real complaint is that I could use more & deeper pockets. I never seem to have enough pockets (I refuse to use a purse). I'm not sure if a man would really like these slacks, but as a female, I love them. I've wear them constantly and can therefore say they wash really well. And when I get all muddy, they still wash well and the mud doesn't stain them (I have other slacks that are stained from the mud). So overall, these have been great for me. THey fit me well (which doesn't say anything for anyone else since everyone is different) and are very comfortable to wear. They are perfect for me to wear outdoors and particularly at our beach place.

评论概述: Men's Cargo Joggers with Drawstring and Lots of Pockets...Not So Breathable
评论详情: I ordered these pants in Large size (my normal), but the length was just a little shorter than I would have expected.  The material is somewhat lightweight, but not very breathable.  I could feel the pants heating up inside the longer I had them on.  The material seems durable, and there are a healthy number of pockets.  As far as the waist fit goes, the elastic waistband and drawstring made it very customizable for someone who typically wears size Large.  I expected that these joggers would work well for summer outdoors, but I think they may be more suitable for cooler spring/fall weather in the South.

While I do really like the cut of these there is zero stretch in the material so while it's baggy around my calves its far tighter on my thighs and not quite as comfortable as I was hoping for.  Alongside it having no stretch the material isn't very soft, but thankfully it is light weight so sweating isn't a huge issue. There are a ton of pockets and they're all nice and deep.  Overall they're fine pants but if you want that baggy look go for a size up.

These are comfortable and very lightweight. I usually wear large but this large was too baggy so I would order a size smaller. Easy to wash. Not really too much on style. Good for around the house....too baggy for jogging.

评论概述: They're okay, but I might choose something else.
评论详情: I'm at the time in life when I can and do wear casual pants most of the time. I will wear these cargo pants ... in warm weather. They are thin. That's not necessarily a bad thing. I have several pairs of pants hiking pants that are as thin and light weight. Those are made of nylon (not polyester), and I've worn them for at least two decades. I'm not sure these ZAFUL pants will last as long. They are comfortable enough and fit fine, but the quality doesn't match my old (and higher priced) ones. The ones I received had one very long loose thread. I do not like loose threads. For me, it represents inferior quality. The pockets do not have zippers, buttons or other means of closure. That's fine, I find such closures a nuisance. The pockets are deep, have long flaps and are unlikely to empty unless I'm turned upside down. It has no rear pockets but does have regular side pockets. For me, an elastic waist is essential. The drawstring is substantial and has metal aglets. I must admit, I much prefer cargo pants, or any other pants, that have a zippered fly. These pants don't have a fly. Overall, these pants are okay, but if I were shopping in a brick-and-mortar store (which I rarely do), I might keep looking.
Good item well-made better than expected
